汤米; 生物信息学疯狂的热汤米https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325826-single-cell-rnaseq-beginner-tutorials-seurat-object-and-singlecellexperiment-object-explained BioNano VCF (OGM) 中的基因组坐标https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325782-genomic-coordinates-in-the-bionano-vcf-ogm Thu, 06 Jun 2024 06:50:42 GMT你好！我需要 BioNano 文件方面的帮助。我有一个 VCF 文件，其中包含来自 BioNano 的结构变体，其中有计算出的近似基因组... Hi! I need a help with BioNano files.

我有一个包含来自 BioNano 的结构变体的 VCF 文件，在 POS 列和 END 字段中计算出结构变体的近似基因组坐标。而且还提供了与 UCSC 的链接和另一个坐标的字段。

例如：

列 POS 和字段 END 包含“chr4:88858934-88862760”和边界错误 +-5991 bp

但 UCSC 是“chr4:88852942-88868750”

哪个坐标更适合使用？为什么结果如此不同？

PS: UCSC 坐标并不总是与 POS/END -+ CIPOS/CIEND 匹配，有时甚至没有交集
​; 生物信息学阿维·申https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325782-genomic-coordinates-in-the-bionano-vcf-ogm Bismark 甲基化调用https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325774-bismark-methylation-calling Thu, 06 Jun 2024 01:58:59 GMT Hi, I have a couple of questions regarding Bismark. I'm sorry if they are stupid questions; I am fairly new to WGBS data and Bismark analysis (or to...Hi, I have a couple of questions regarding Bismark. I'm sorry if they are stupid questions; I am fairly new to WGBS data and Bismark analysis (or to bioinformatics in general). We are researching non-model fish animals. Recently, their genomes have become available in the NCBI database, and their assembly level is Scaffold (Additionally, it is still unannotated). Concurrently, there is another project in our laboratory to sequence our target organisms. I, in particular, have been tasked with analyzing WGBS data from our target animal. I already have the raw WGBS reads (Library type: Accel Methyl-Seq DNA library) and I have already done the initial steps such as aligning it to the assembled genome (mapping efficiency: ~51%) and doing deduplication. As of right now, I want to do the next step of the pipeline which is methylation calling. however, my concern is that most of the papers that I've read says that I should use annotated genome during methylation calling however, our current available genome is still being annotated and what we have is only the assembled genome. is it ok to use the only assembled genome for methylation calling and for subsequent downstream analyses (DMRs/DMGs)? so far I tried to run methylation calling for one sample (see report below: )

[我使用的脚本/命令：bismark_methylation_extractor --compressive --bedGraph --gzip --scaffolds --cytosine_report --genome_folder]

运行甲基化调用后，我得到了这些输出文件：


当我打开 [Sample]_bismark_bt2_pe.deduplicated.cytosine_context_summary.txt 文件时，txt 文件中没有报告。但是 [Sample]_pe.deduplicated.M-bias.txt 和 [Sample]_bismark_bt2_pe.deduplicated_splitting_report.txt 有报告（请参阅下面 [Sample]_bismark_bt2_pe.deduplicated_splitting_report.txt 的代表性报告​​：）

[示例]bismark_bt2_pe.deduplicated.bam

用于提取甲基化信息的参数：
Bismark 提取器版本：v0.23.1
Bismark 结果文件：paired-end（SAM 格式）
指定输出：综合
未指定重叠甲基化调用

总共处理了 48784544 行
处理的甲基化调用字符串总数：97569088

最终胞嘧啶甲基化报告
分析的 C 总数：1891803435

CpG 背景下的总甲基化 C：136624254
CHG 背景下的甲基化 C 总数：1889811
CHH 背景下甲基化 C 总数：5987407

CpG 上下文中的 C 到 T 转化总数：40920797
CHG 上下文中的 C 到 T 转化总数：415950132
CHH 上下文中的 C 到 T 转换总数：1290431034

C 在 CpG 背景下甲基化：77.0%
CHG 背景下的 C 甲基化：0.5%
CHH 中的 C 甲基化：0.5%

我的方法正确吗？
​; 生物信息学安东尼奥https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325774-bismark-methylation-calling
